thread.title: Boy, 13, shot in arm in Gresham | Chicago Sun-Times
thread.title_full: Boy, 13, shot in arm in Gresham | Chicago Sun-Times

title: Boy, 13, shot in arm in Gresham | Chicago Sun-Times
text:
Sign-Up for our News & Politics Newsletter Sign-Up 
A 13-year-old boy was shot Sunday night in the Gresham neighborhood on the South Side. 
The shooting happened at 8:14 p.m. when a dark colored SUV pulled up to the boy in the 7600 block of South Peoria and someone inside fired shots, Chicago Police said. He suffered a gunshot wound to his left arm. 
The boy was taken to Comer Children’s Hospital, where he was in good condition, police said. Previously from Chicago News
